ISSUE.TITLE: You can create a product attribute value type Associated to a Product without association
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: V 3.80 - Create a product with a product attribute - Create a value for the attribute type "Associated to a product" and, without associating the product, save it: it lets you save it without zny error message. - When you add to cart this product with this attribute value selected it will display the error message Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/45399/you-can-create-a-product-attribute-value-type-associated-to-a-product-without-association.aspx

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #1950 "GetStoreUrl" method of MessageTokenProvider doesn't properly detect secure URL in some cases. Furthremore, "useSsl" parameter is not used.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1948 Ensure that a store owner cannot create a product attribute with "Associated to a Product" type without association
